title: Deep Learning Practical Skills Enhancement: Mobile-Based Mathematics Competency Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three procedural steps for solving work-related math problems using microlearning content (under 5 minutes) provided in mobile environments
Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in analyzing work-applied cases through context-based quizzes (formative assessments) provided five times weekly
Learners can represent at least two complex math concepts in graph/chart formats through interactive simulations provided on mobile platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
